title: Right nav appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND right-side nav has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN all text in the right nav is dark blue
AND there are 2 headers in all caps: top header = My Departments, bottom header = Recent Documents
AND any text listed below the headers is upper case/lower case
AND any text listed below the headers is underlined
AND all text is left aligned
AND no text overlaps each other
AND no text overlaps the box
AND no text is cut off unless there is an ellipses present (...)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19617)

title: Right nav loads, at or below 991px
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
custom_expected:
THEN no right-side nav appears
AND a white box appears below the white box that contains Apps
AND that white box at the bottom contains Department and Document information.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19049)

title: Right nav appearance, at or below 991px
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
custom_expected:
THEN the right-side nav is not visible
AND a white box has appeared below the Apps white box
AND this white box at the bottom contains the same text as the right-side nav
AND this text is formatted the same as in the right-side nav
AND this text is left aligned
AND no text overlaps each other or the box
AND no text is cut off unless there is an ellipses present (...)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19051)

title: Right nav info function: links select, at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND a white box has appeared below the Apps white box
AND this bottom white box contains text that is not an all-caps header
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any text that is not a header
custom_expected:
IF text was a department name
THEN page redirects to the correct department page in the same tab
OR
IF text was a document name
THEN page redirects to the correct document in the same tab

title: Right nav: Documents listed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND right-side nav has appeared
AND user has Followed Departments
AND Owners in those Departments have uploaded documents
custom_expected:
THEN in the right-side nav those documents are listed under Recent Documents
AND up to 4 documents can appear
AND the documents are in order of the most recently uploaded from top to bottom
AND beneath each document name is its Owner's Department
AND each document name is linked
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19052)

title: Right nav: Document listed, at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND user is on the main page
AND a white box has appeared below the Apps white box
AND this bottom white box contains My Departments and Recent Documents information
AND user has followed Departments
AND Owners in those Departments have uploaded documents
custom_expected:
THEN in the bottom white box those documents are listed under Recent Documents
AND up to 4 documents can appear
AND the documents are in order of the most recently uploaded from top to bottom
AND beneath each document name is its Owner's Department
AND each document name is linked
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19053)

title: Right nav function: add Department link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has clicked on Departments in the left-side nav
AND the Global Departments page has loaded
AND user has clicked on a Department
AND the correct Department home page has loaded
AND the Department home page has a red button with the label Follow
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on the red button labeled Follow
AND user clicks on Home in the left-side nav or the InsideMLB logo in the header
custom_expected:
THEN the main page loads in the same tab
AND the right-side nav appears
AND in the right-side nav the name of the Department user Followed is listed alphabetically under My Departments

title: Right nav info function: add Department link, at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has clicked on Departments in the left-side nav
AND the Global Departments page has loaded
AND user has clicked on a Department
AND the correct Department home page has loaded
AND the Department home page has a red button with the label Follow
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the red button labeled Follow
AND user clicks on Home in the left-side nav or the InsideMLB logo in the header
custom_expected:
THEN main page loads in the same tab
AND a white box appears below the Apps white box
AND in this bottom white box the name of the Department user Followed is listed alphabetically under My Departments

title: Right nav function: remove Department link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has clicked on Departments in the left-side nav
AND the Global Departments page has loaded
AND user has clicked on a Department
AND the correct Department home page has loaded
AND the Department home page has a red button with the label Unfollow
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on the red button labeled Unfollow
AND user clicks on Home in the left-side nav or the InsideMLB logo in the header
custom_expected:
THEN main page loads in the same tab
AND right-side nav appears
AND in the right-side nav the name of the Department user Unfollowed is not visible

custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px

AND the Global Departments page has loaded

AND the Department home page has a red button with the label Unfollow

WHEN user clicks or taps on the red button labeled Unfollow

custom_expected:

AND a white box appears below the Apps white box
AND in this bottom white box the name of the Department user Unfollowed is not visible

title: Test responsiveness
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected.

Note: In Windows IE and Edge, Chatter images will be stretched.

title: Test mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is using a mobile device
custom_expected:
THEN all elements appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other
AND all elements function as expected

title: Right nav headers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND right-side nav has appeared
AND nav has 2 headers, My Departments and Recent Documents
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks or taps on either header
custom_expected: THEN nothing happens - the 2 headers are not linked.

title: Right nav info headers, at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND white box has appeared below the Apps white box
AND this bottom white box has 2 headers, My Departments and Recent Documents
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on either header
custom_expected: THEN nothing happens - the headers are not linked

title: Right nav function: links hover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND right-side nav has appeared
AND nav contains text that is not an all-caps header
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hovers cursor over a Department name
OR the user hovers cursor over a Document title
custom_expected: THEN cursor changes from an arrow to a pointing hand

custom_steps:

custom_expected: THEN cursor changes from an arrow to a pointing hand

title: Right nav loads
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
custom_expected:
THEN nav appears at the right side of the screen
AND it is a white box
AND it does not overlap with the center section white box
AND no department information appears below the Apps in the center section

GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
